snippet: Shows can be saved manually, but there are also ways to automatically keep files backed up. Also, blocking Facebook game requests.
abstract: Personal Tech Q&A column on manually backing up podcasts downloaded from the iTunes store; blocking Facebook game requests from friends; Tip of the Week about the update to Auto Backup feature of the Google Plus service.
lead_paragraph: Shows can be saved manually, but there are also ways to automatically keep files backed up. Also, blocking Facebook game requests.

headline.main: How to Back Up iTunes Podcasts
headline.print_headline: How to Back Up iTunes Podcasts
